sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: P. 3- For the last five years young Mr. Youros, an engineer and architect, has been connected with the Hennbique Construction Company, where he has established a record for efficiency. At the last meeting of the board of directors of that company Mr. Youros by unanimous vote was elected general advisor of the company. He has under his jurisdiction both the company's offices, one of which is located in the Chemical Building in St. Louis and the other in the Monadnock Block in Chicago.
This young Greek, who hails from the beautiful Island of Zante, received his degree in France, and when he arrived in Chicago, he was immediately employed by the Hennebique Company.
